 2002-15852002-09-240,  ,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, VI AND VIII) by relocating the definition for "flight information services" from Part VIII to Part I (General Provisions), by replacing references to the "SCATANA plan" with references to the "ESCAT plan", by reinstating references to air traffic control services and procedures that were inadvertently omitted, and by making provision for on-the-job training and certification of flight service specialists, under supervision.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0352 Publication Date: 2002-10-09
Attachments
